g.title: leaf_6
g.text: This is a standalone program to restore grym in the event that a knit
results in an unusable grym module.

g.title: leaf_7
g.text: The plan: A =.grym= file in the root directory will contain any
knit-modified files from the last pass. =grym= itself will read and write
to the .grym file, maintaining a data structure in the meantime; this will
be in Lua-native table format, at first, eventually Clu(den).

g.title: leaf_15
g.text: This is pure script, we shouldn't even need a function

g.title: leaf_17
g.text: os.exit("Must be called with a root codex directory", 1)
s:chat("No contents in grymback. No action taken.")
